metadata.title: CVE-2023-52491 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: media:mtk-jpeg: Fix use after free bug due to error path handling inmtk_jpeg_dec_device_run In mtk_jpeg_probe, &jpeg->job_timeout_work is boundwith mtk_jpeg_job_timeout_work. In mtk_jpeg_dec_device_run, if errorhappens in mtk_jpeg_set_dec_dst, it will finally start the worker whilemark the job as finished by invoking v4l2_m2m_job_finish. There are twomethods to trigger the bug. If we remove the module, it which will callmtk_jpeg_remove to make cleanup. The possible sequence is as follows, whichwill cause a use-after-free bug. CPU0 CPU1 mtk_jpeg_dec_... | start worker| |mtk_jpeg_job_timeout_work mtk_jpeg_remove | v4l2_m2m_release |kfree(m2m_dev); | | | v4l2_m2m_get_curr_priv | m2m_dev->curr_ctx //use Ifwe close the file descriptor, which will call mtk_jpeg_release, it willhave a similar sequence. Fix this bug by starting timeout worker only ifstarted jpegdec worker successfully. Then v4l2_m2m_job_finish will only becalled in either mtk_jpeg_job_timeout_work or mtk_jpeg_dec_device_run.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52491` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-106-generic - 5.15.0-106.116
linux-image-5.15.0-106-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-106.116
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-106-generic - 5.15.0-106.116
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-106-generic-64k - 5.15.0-106.116
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1058-kvm - 5.15.0-1058.63
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1063-azure - 5.15.0-1063.72
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1058-gke - 5.15.0-1058.63
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1044-gkeop - 5.15.0-1044.51
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1054-ibm - 5.15.0-1054.57
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-106-lowlatency - 5.15.0-106.116
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-106-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-106.116
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1054-nvidia - 5.15.0-1054.55

No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-106.116').
linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2').
